alert.note: Alert for Decatur; Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Gulf, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida, south central Walton County in the Panhandle of Florida, central Liberty, northwestern Jefferson and Leon Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Decatur, southern Grady Counties in southwestern Georgia and southern Thomas Counties in south central Georgia through 430 PM EDT/330 PM CDT/... At 326 PM EDT/226 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles north of Havana to 8 miles northeast of Blountstown to 10 miles north of Lynn Haven. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Blountstown, Midway, Florida A and M, Thomasville, Springfield, Boston, Hiland Park, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Tyndall Air Force Base and Orange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT/700 PM CDT/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida...and south central and southwestern Georgia.
